entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 08:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
